PharmaKure 宣布与谢菲尔德哈勒姆大学进行表观遗传学合作，以了解阿尔茨海默病的机制新的合作将增强识别那些更容易患脑部疾病的人的能力，以便尽早进行干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/PharmaKure-announces-epigenics-collaboration-with-Sheffield-Hallam-University-to-understand-mechanisms-of-Alzheimere28099s-Diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/PharmaKure-announces-epigenics-collaboration-with-Sheffield-Hallam-University-to-understand-mechanisms-of-Alzheimere28099s-Diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=150db554-32a7-49e8-a296-a56e4a15f6b4 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 08:50:00 -0500 PharmaKure announces epigenetics collaboration with Sheffield Hallam University to understand mechanisms of Alzheimer’s Diseases
运动、GLP-1 受体激动剂或为期一年的研究探索的组合方法研究人员比较了使用 GLP-1 受体激动剂、运动或组合进行积极干预一年后的体重减轻程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Exercise-GLP-1-receptor-agonist-or-combined-approach-explored-in-year-long-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Exercise-GLP-1-receptor-agonist-or-combined-approach-explored-in-year-long-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72cf4561-8c2a-4c88-a785-b32e0e1f250d Thu, 29 Feb 2024 08:33:00 -0500 Exercise, GLP-1 receptor agonist, or combined approach explored in year-long study
基于深度学习的模型开发可预测普通病房的关键儿科事件预测普通病房儿科个体危急事件的模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Deep-learning-based-model-development-to-predict-ritic-pediatric-events-in-general-wards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Deep-learning-based-model-development-to-predict-ritic-pediatric-events-in-general-wards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8286ced-a296-4e02-a1fd-0d719474c053 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 08:15:00 -0500 Deep learning-based model development to predict critical pediatric events in general wards
含雌激素的更年期激素治疗与 COVID-19 死亡率的关系研究人员评估了围绝经期女性中与 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 相关的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Association-of-estrogen-containing-menopause-hormonal-therapy-with-COVID-19-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Association-of-estrogen-containing-menopause-hormonal-therapy-with-COVID-19-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6184af93-7721-4255-a9f1-5a12545a97de Thu, 29 Feb 2024 06:35:00 -0500 Association of estrogen-containing menopause hormonal therapy with COVID-19 mortality
研究发现，“大流行婴儿”肠道微生物组发育发生改变，过敏率降低根据 RCSI 医学与健康科学大学、爱尔兰儿童健康中心和世界领先的 SFI 爱尔兰 APC 微生物组 (APC) 的最新研究，COVID-19 大流行期间实施的封锁对该时期出生的婴儿的肠道微生物组发育产生了影响研究中心位于科克大学学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Pandemic-babies-show-altered-gut-microbiome-development-and-lower-allergy-rates-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Pandemic-babies-show-altered-gut-microbiome-development-and-lower-allergy-rates-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b85bcb4-06eb-4d78-ac1e-1e20c6316250 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 06:22:00 -0500 'Pandemic babies' show altered gut microbiome development and lower allergy rates, study finds
加州大学洛杉矶分校研究人员发现 GAN 基因在神经系统疾病、头颈癌中的双重作用加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员首次表明，一种通常与巨大轴突神经病（一种罕见且严重的神经系统疾病）相关的基因也在抑制头颈癌中侵袭性肿瘤细胞生长方面发挥着作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/UCLA-researchers-uncover-dual-role-of-GAN-gene-in-neurological-disorder-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/UCLA-researchers-uncover-dual-role-of-GAN-gene-in-neurological-disorder-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cabb0bac-3719-4af0-b130-0675de305d76 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 06:13:05 -0500 UCLA researchers uncover dual role of GAN gene in neurological disorder, head and neck cancer
研究发现不健康饮食与慢性疼痛严重程度之间存在联系，呼吁全面的饮食支持慢性疼痛患者的饮食和生活习惯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Research-finds-link- Between-unhealthy-eating-and-chronic-pain-severity-calls-for-compressive-dietary-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Research-finds-link- Between-unhealthy-eating-and-chronic-pain-severity-calls-for-compressive-dietary-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30a96f0e-5a93-46c3-8495-0ab1feeb5986 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 05:49:00 -0500
对医疗设备进行消毒的有毒气体促使安全规则更新在过去的两年里，玛德琳·比尔在公开会议上听到了有关环氧乙烷的沮丧甚至困惑，环氧乙烷是一种致癌气体，用于对美国一半的医疗设备进行消毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Toxic-gas-that-sterilizes-medical-devices-prompts-safety-rule-update.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Toxic-gas-that-sterilizes-medical-devices-prompts-safety-rule-update.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4ec0eef-f47c-4c54-972e-ec7979c1068e Thu, 29 Feb 2024 05:45:54 -0500 Toxic gas that sterilizes medical devices prompts safety rule update
研究发现不健康饮食与慢性疼痛严重程度之间存在联系，呼吁全面的饮食支持慢性疼痛患者的饮食和生活习惯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Research-finds-link- Between-unhealthy-eating-and-chronic-pain-severity-calls-for-compressive-dietary-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Research-finds-link- Between-unhealthy-eating-and-chronic-pain-severity-calls-for-compressive-dietary-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8eb16c2-7ffa-4bf9-a72c-7c834d22ce3b Thu, 29 Feb 2024 05:45:00 -0500 Research finds link between unhealthy eating and chronic pain severity, calls for comprehensive dietary support
联合健康医疗部门的黑客攻击削弱了美国医疗系统的大范围：须知2月21日一早，Change Healthcare，一家大多数美国人都不知道的公司，在美国医疗系统中发挥着巨大作用，发布了一份简短声明，称其部分应用程序“目前无法使用”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Hacking-at-UnitedHealth-unit-cripples-a-swath-of-the-US-health-system-What-to-know.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Hacking-at-UnitedHealth-unit-cripples-a-swath-of-the-US-health-system-What-to-know.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e97c7d0-c568-4501-9c4a-42c55ca67584 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 05:44:20 -0500 Hacking at UnitedHealth unit cripples a swath of the US health system: What to know
